Texts.Chs: 把^orange;啤酒花^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;hops^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 接下来我们会需要到一些^orange;啤酒花^white;.我想你可以在^green;泰拉市场^white;上买到啤酒花的种子。然后种下它们，收获至少^orange;2个啤酒花^white;。因为没有啤酒花就没法酿啤酒，没有啤酒，什么都没了。
Texts.Eng: For the next steps you'll need some ^orange;hops^white;. I think you can buy some seeds at ^green;Terramart^white;. Make them grow and gather at least ^orange;2 hops^white;. Because without hops, we get no beer. And without beer we cry.

Texts.Chs: 这是一个好的开始。请务必收集一些小麦，因为你下一步会需要到它。
Texts.Eng: That's a good start. Be sure to keep some wheat as you'll need it next.
